definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.chinese: “他是一名生存主義者，”阿奇博爾德說。

sentences.english: Detail of a crevasse in the surface of the Humboldt glacier.
sentences.chinese: 漢博爾德冰川表面清晰的裂縫。

sentences.english: With mixed feelings he said good - bye to Dy . Archibald.
sentences.chinese: 他懷着矛盾的心情告別了阿奇博爾德大夫。

sentences.english: The residents of Boulder ordered the most books in the cooking, food, and wine category.
sentences.chinese: 博爾德的居民訂得最多的是烹飪，食物和酒類書籍。

sentences.english: Mr. archibald did not give himself the trouble of making many remonstrances.
sentences.chinese: 阿奇博爾德先生似乎不想自找麻煩多方規勸。
